meanings.definition: The ability to perceive sounds or words from a distance or from the spirit world.
meanings.sent1: Her clairaudiences allowed her to hear whispers from the other side.
meanings.sent2: Some people claim to have clairaudiences and hear voices beyond this realm.
meanings.sent3: During the seance, her clairaudiences picked up on a ghostly choir singing.
meanings.sent4: His clairaudiences were so acute, he could hear the wind whispering secrets.
meanings.sent5: The clairaudiences of the psychic were so clear, she could hear the thoughts of others.

meanings.definition: The act of hearing sounds or voices that are not physically present.
meanings.sent1: The clairaudiences she experienced made her believe in the supernatural.
meanings.sent2: Sometimes, clairaudiences can be mistaken for actual voices due to their clarity.
meanings.sent3: His clairaudiences were so vivid, he thought the radio was playing when it was off.
meanings.sent4: In the silence of the night, her clairaudiences brought forth the echoes of the past.
meanings.sent5: The clairaudiences of the haunted house made it seem like the walls were whispering secrets.
